hadith.text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by ‘Abd Allah b. Zam’ah through a different chain. He said:When the Prophet (May peace be upon him) heard ‘Umar’s voice, Ibn Zam’ah said: The Prophet (May peace be upon him) came out until he took out his head of his apartment. He then said : No, no, no; the son of Abu Quhafah should lead the people in prayer. He said it angrily
